name: Rive
title: rive.app
shortDescription: Rive is a comprehensive tool designed for the creation and implementation of user interfaces across various platforms. It integrates a unique editor, a stateful graphics format, and a high-performance runtime and renderer. This ensures that designs made in Rive translate seamlessly into real-world applications, making it ideal for developers and designers in gaming, apps, and web development.
cons: May require learning new tools and workflows
